verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: tells] [ARG2: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARG1: that if his country abandons its nuclear program it could build beachside condos and hotels] .
President Trump tells North Korean leader Kim Jong Un that if [ARG0: his country] [V: abandons] [ARG1: its nuclear program] it could build beachside condos and hotels .
President Trump tells North Korean leader Kim Jong Un that if his country abandons its nuclear program it [V: could] build beachside condos and hotels .
